General.Name: Pinehill Pacific Bhd
General.Description: Pinehill Pacific Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the oil palm cultivation and processing business in Indonesia. The company offers crude palm oil, palm kernel, and fresh fruit brunches, as well as provides plantation management services. It has 8,022 hectares of oil palm plantations at Kabupaten (District) Sintang and Kalimantan Barat, Indonesia. The company was formerly known as Multi Vest Resources Berhad and changed its name to Pinehill Pacific Berhad in January 2011. The company was incorporated in 1917 and is based in Puchong, Malaysia.
